name: Ruturaj Chaubey
description: A Full Stack Engineer at QED42, knee-deep in Next.js, Drupal, GenAI, and the occasional existential bug. When I'm not arguing with my code, I'm on the badminton court trying to smash my way to glory. Also, a loyal (and slightly heartbroken) FC Barcelona fan and yes, we still believe.

ventures.title: Curate
ventures.description: A tool to help you curate content for your audience
